trans-unit.source: Step 7: Create a Topic and Subscription
trans-unit.target: Step 7: Create a Topic and Subscription

trans-unit.source: This is the seventh of nine tasks required to create a basic REST-style queue and publication/subscription application that uses <token>sb1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This is the seventh of nine tasks required to create a basic REST-style queue and publication/subscription application that uses <token>sb1</token>.

trans-unit.source: The next step is to write a method that uses the REST-style HTTP PUT command to create a topic.
trans-unit.target: The next step is to write a method that uses the REST-style HTTP PUT command to create a topic.

trans-unit.source: Then, you write a method that creates a subscription to that topic.
trans-unit.target: Then, you write a method that creates a subscription to that topic.
